About Me

Hello, I am Serhat.I graduated from Eskişehir Osmangazi University/electrical and electronics engineering.
I was interested in web technologies at university. I took programming and networking classes. I know HTML, CSS, SASS, javascript, bootstrap, react.js and git. I like coding and designing that's why I want to be a front end developer.
I believe I will be an asset to your software development team.
